website_summaries.verdict: An inspirational story accompanied by recipes that are also gluten-free and safe for diabetics.
pros: Full of inspiring weight loss anecdotes from the author and his family
Includes an array of helpful tips as well as 130 low-carb recipes
Recipes are free of wheat and added sugar making them gluten-free and diabetic friendly
cons: Nutritional facts can be hard to follow
Most baking recipes call for artificial sweeteners

customer_reviews.title: Saving Grace
customer_reviews.text: We decided to start eating low carb at the beginning of the year. As always I quickly ran out of ideas for meals. I've had this book a couple of weeks now and absolutely love it!! There has not been one thing I've made we haven't liked... looking forward to trying everything out. I don't think you'd be disappointed trying this out even if you are not doing low carb!! PS... my husband and I are down 35lbs so far :)
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Cookbook!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this book 3 times now, for myself and family members! Everyone loves the recipes - I think I've made about half from the book so far and there are definite favorites now that I have to keep making for my family. Great photos and nice layout cookbook. You will not miss your carbs when cooking with this book - so much yum!
customer_reviews.author: Lavone

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Love this book! I’m in college and these recipes are easy, simple, and delicious! Exactly what I was looking for. I don’t have time to cook for hours and I hate when recipe books have weird/elaborate ingredients- not the case at all of this book! The ingredients are easy to find and the recipes are totally doable. The picture is of the blueberry muffins, soooo good!! Buy this book you won’t regret it. 😋
customer_reviews.author: I.G.

customer_reviews.title: 20 star rating for this book!!
customer_reviews.text: I would like to give this book 20 stars!! I was so excited when I opened the book and saw it was in large font!! Nicely planned out index, shopping lists, tips. All without over whelming me with info. I was also happy to finally find a cookbook with ingredients I use. I ref this book daily for healthy ideas and recipes. Can't say enough about it. So happy I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Celeste P

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit that I'm a big fan of George Stella. We have all of his other cookbooks, and we have enjoyed all the dishes that we have tried. George always provides top notch recipes, and this book contains many of them! Great book for the low carber, or for someone who just wants to eat fewer carbs without losing flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Paul

customer_reviews.title: Low Carbers Bible
customer_reviews.text: The food is very "normal". You don't have to go out of your way to buy a bunch of specialty foods and ingredients. You can serve these items to anybody and they wouldn't think twice. It's more than a cookbook, it's a way of thinking that opens your eyes.
customer_reviews.author: lpnboyz

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: I am a newer cook and was hesitant to try the recipes. The Chicken Marsala was amazing. I can’t believe I cooked something so good. I had to make some minor changes, forgot to buy an onion, only had beef bouillon cubes, no parsley, and used chicken thighs instead of breasts. If I never cook anything else out of this book, the cost would still be worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: This is a great book! I can't believe this guy is a ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great book! I can't believe this guy is a chef, because all of his recipes were down-to-earth and simple enough for me to think about making...I can't decide which one to try first! This guy has lived the low-carb way for 15 years and has really made it work for real life. I am really impressed, and love the whole book....
customer_reviews.author: navylady

customer_reviews.title: I love 'The Complete Low-Carb Cookbook'
customer_reviews.text: I love 'The Complete Low-Carb Cookbook'! Every recipe that I have made has been excellent! I have made several recipes from this cookbook and they are all delicious! It is very easy to make low-carb recipes. If you are supposed to watch your carbs and sugars you will really enjoy this cookbook! There are a lot of pictures throughout the cookbook too! If you are looking for a low carb cookbook, look no further, this is one of the best!
customer_reviews.author: SForsberg

customer_reviews.title: Best cookbook I own!!
customer_reviews.text: We started eating low carb to help improve our diets for health reasons, not necessarily weight loss. We cut out breads, pastas, rice, etc , but struggled I struggled with meal ideas. Then I found this cookbook. After using it for two weeks, I have loved every recipe I’ve tried. Still getting used to the taste of baked goods with almond flour and sugar substitute, but I could not be happier with how well this cookbook had improved my cooking. The BBQ sauce recipe is fabulous. I’ll never buy pre-made again. Can’t wait to try more of these recipes.
customer_reviews.author: J and J

customer_reviews.title: Item left out of recipe
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cookbook, and made the spaghetti squash spaghetti, it was g-r-e-a-t! I also made the cheesecake and was very disappointed. I even email George to ask if he could figure out the problem. I never heard from George, but I google low carb recipes and low and behold George's recipe comes up and in my cookbook it doesn't list sour cream. Now, I'm wondering about the other recipes....:(. I guess I'll print the recipe off the internet. Not really happy about this.
customer_reviews.author: brand0at

customer_reviews.title: Having fun cooking low carb
customer_reviews.text: This cookbook has inspired to fall in love with cooking again...and more importantly cooking delicious low carb meals that my family enjoys. My husband gets excited when I start searching for recipes because he knows it will be creative. Thank you for providing these wonderful, easy to make recipes. I and my family have truly enjoyed everything about this book.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Calloway

customer_reviews.title: Good book if they package it right
customer_reviews.text: This book is good has lots of good recipes, however book was wrapped in bubble wrap and cover was damaged. It’s a gift for my son who is on low-carb diet. The book is a 5 but because of damaged to book I will give it a 3. I brought the same book for myself last week and it was shipped in a box. I don’t think I should have to drive 20 miles to ship it back.
customer_reviews.author: sandra Andracsek

customer_reviews.title: Best of the Best
customer_reviews.text: Forget all the other Lo-Carb books. This is the only one you need.
customer_reviews.author: Maggiesue

customer_reviews.title: Great Low Carb Recipes
customer_reviews.text: Great Low Carb recipes in this cookbook by George Stella. It will help you discover how low carb doesn't have to mean unappetizing and boring. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Must have low carb cookbook.  If you love food and flavors and want to eat a good variety, you must have this.
customer_reviews.text: Very useful book because it has basic recipes for things you will use in other recipes. Such as making almond flour. Also has sauce recipes. Very hard to find low carb sauces in stores that have any good flavor. Best cookbook I've found for people looking to eat less carbs, but still love what they are eating.
customer_reviews.author: Mad_Spender

customer_reviews.title: Not For Everyday Use
customer_reviews.text: We don't cook "fancy" around here and these recipes are just too complicated. I wanted more everyday easy low carb recipes. I also do not use Splenda; this author uses only Splenda. Had I known that I would not have ordered this cookbook. Sadly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: JAG

customer_reviews.title: Nice.
customer_reviews.text: I love that this book has pictures and it is layed out nice, BUT why can't the authors of these cookbooks make spiral bound books so they can lay flat on your counter?
customer_reviews.author: YellowBug

customer_reviews.title: Great Cookbook for a Newbie!
customer_reviews.text: My husband's doctor strongly suggested he consider a low-carb diet. I checked out several cookbooks from our local library and soon got frustrated. The recipes I found in these books by other authors were confusing or unappealing. I took a chance ordering this book, sight unseen based on reviews. I have not regretted the purchase! I have tried several of the recipes and all of them have been very good. The recipes are easy to follow and since I am cooking for two, we have some great left-overs.
customer_reviews.author: DJH

customer_reviews.title: Great cookbook even if you're not low carb.
customer_reviews.text: I've tried several of the recipes at this point and like them all: the tuna salad, cilantro lime chicken thighs, and parmesan crusted chicken breasts. They've been easy to prep and taste great. There are a number of others I definitely plan to try and very few I wouldn't consider making. I really like that the ingredients have all been things I can buy at a regular grocery store. One of the few cookbooks I own that I use regularly.
customer_reviews.author: dpage

customer_reviews.title: ... all 5 of this man's cook books and I recommend them to anyone who needs a change of life ...
customer_reviews.text: Have all 5 of this man's cook books and I recommend them to anyone who needs a change of life style. I lost 77 lbs and 7 dress sizes!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Hollingsworth

customer_reviews.title: Great cookbook
customer_reviews.text: I've been on Bistro MD for five months and lost 35 lbs. Now transitioning to daily low carb cooking on my own. Have owned this book for a little over a week and have made 3 recipes. Every one delicious and still losing! Wish I had known about this style of eating years ago.
customer_reviews.author: A Texas Reader

customer_reviews.title: Easy & Delicious Recipes for the Carb Conscious
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my father in law who just started a low carb diet on Doctor's orders. It was very well received. We tried two recipes, the garlic knot chicken wings and cookies. Both were very good. As other reviewers noted, the recipes are fairly easy and straight forward. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Christine S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Book
customer_reviews.text: Five stars for one recipe alone! The Mixed Berry Muffins are a staple around my house now. My husband and I are both diabetic and the muffins are great for sweet cravings or just for a quick breakfast with coffee. I have tried several of the other recipes and all are quick, easy and tasty.
customer_reviews.author: Fran

customer_reviews.title: This is a GREAT book!
customer_reviews.text: I love that he just gives you the sugar-equivalent amount in each recipe so you can use the sweetener(s) that work for you! The recipes are relatively simple--you don't have to want to be a chef to make them, the instructions are simple, and he starts the book with some general notes about his approach. The variety of recipes is enough to give a low-carb beginner a good start.
customer_reviews.author: Spots

customer_reviews.title: My go-to cookbook!
customer_reviews.text: Every recipe I've tried has been good, some are REALLY good! I use this one a lot. I recommend this to everyone. I have others by this cook, but this book is excellent throughout.
customer_reviews.author: Joie McClements

customer_reviews.title: Straight forward easy layout
customer_reviews.text: I love this book! The recipes are easy, appetizing, satisfying and tastey. They don't require expensive hard to find ingredients. The best part is the layout. Simple. Pictures of each recipe, shopping list, directions and lists calories, fat and carbs. The carbs are really low. I couldn't, wouldn't want to figure this part on my own. If your having trouble keeping carbs as low as required, you have to buy this book.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Johnson

customer_reviews.title: I love the fact that there is a list of ingredients ...
customer_reviews.text: Just came in the mail today and I’m so excited to start. I love the fact that there is a list of ingredients from the start that are regularly used in the recipes that you can buy and have on hand before you even decide what you want to cook first. The recipes look amazing I will be starting with the wings. I can’t wait to go grocery shopping this weekend and that says a lot cause I hate grocery shopping.
customer_reviews.author: latiqua

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cookbook! My husband asks why I bought a cookbook when I have the internet and Pinterest - until I started cooking out of it! The recipes are EASY and they have so much flavor! I’m cutting cards and sugar to feel better and get healthy - this makes it so EASY! I have a picky household and this book is no match for them. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kati S

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: Great book. The recipes are easy to follow and everything we've tried has been delicious. There are plenty of color photos which is nice. My husband and I made the commitment to lose weight and live healthier and have lost 40 pounds between us in the past couple of months. We feel great and never felt as if we were on a "diet". I would recommend this book to anyone who wants to lead a low carb life style.
customer_reviews.author: Karen B

customer_reviews.title: Very good Low Carb Cookbook
customer_reviews.text: I tried this book, and am not sorry. I'm trying Keto and Low Carb, and this book has some very good recipes that I can't wait to try. Written well, good back story, very motivating. Highly Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kiya05

customer_reviews.title: Great cookbook for low carb
customer_reviews.text: Great cookbook for low carb. You won't miss a thing. This book is one of many low carb cookbooks I have but is heads above the rest! The recipes are gourmet but easy. Mine has food spots and curled edges. I depend on it and serve company recipes from this book. They can't tell the difference. Try the Chicken Marsalis, yum!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: The use of almond flour and other exotic flours did ...
customer_reviews.text: The use of almond flour and other exotic flours did not sit well on my palate. It's different, but the desserts leave something to be desired when using the flour and sugar substitutes.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas M Brothers

customer_reviews.title: Helpful Book & Recipes
customer_reviews.text: Just reading the book, haven’t made anything yet. Recipes look easy & delicious. Wish the back index was listed by ingredients & not recipes; I think too many recipes have too much sweetener, regardless whether you use stevia or “real sugar”, coconut sugar, agave or whatever. Glad the carb content is listed for each recipe, as I am going “low carb” for health reasons & to lose a few pounds. If these recipes helped the authors family lose over 500 lbs total for 4 people, I’m sure they will help me lose 20!
customer_reviews.author: hiking hippie

customer_reviews.title: No way to easily search recipes
customer_reviews.text: This book has some good recipes. They are a pain in the butt to find! The tables of contents brings up the first section—only! You have TO WASTE YOUR PRECIOUS TIME FLIPPING THROUGH EACH CONFOUNDED PAGE TO FIND SOMETHING OR GO THE LAST PAGE IN PREVIOUS SECTION AND FLIP TO NEXT SECTION OF CONTENTS. WOULD LOVE TO GET A REFUND.
customer_reviews.author: Ranae Zurawski

customer_reviews.title: his are the best by far
customer_reviews.text: I am giving everyone a heads up, I have bought many low carb cookbooks, his are the best by far, spend the little extra, you will be glad you did. I don't even care for the other books. His are easy and taste great, I just ordered the ones I did not have..
customer_reviews.author: vennie g.

customer_reviews.title: I love this cook book
customer_reviews.text: I love this cook book. The recipes are so good, you don't know you are eating to lose weight. I have lost 20 lbs on these recipes.
customer_reviews.author: gdw

customer_reviews.title: Great Low Carb Cookbook
customer_reviews.text: My Wife has made several items [All Delicious] She says the ONLY Low Carb Cookbook you'll Need.
customer_reviews.author: The Old Dude

customer_reviews.title: My New Go-To Cookbook
customer_reviews.text: I rarely use a cookbook, usually just go online these days, but I will keep this cookbook forever. We already have some favorites that I repeat fairly often, and then I try a new one and wonder why I didn't try it sooner! We try to stick to low-carb, but just seasoning meat or fish and putting it on the grill gets boring. These recipes are extra good when you have the time to put in a little more effort, but they are not complicated. And some are very simple.
customer_reviews.author: Rene Q.

customer_reviews.title: I can't say enough good things about this cook book
customer_reviews.text: OMG! I can't say enough good things about this cook book. I was having a terrible time loosing weight and my doctor put me on a stick low carb diet and this book has been a god's sent. I thought I was doomed to eat just meat and cheese for the rest of my life and never get to eat dessert but with this book, I can see staying low carb forever! I have also purchased 4 more of his books (past editions) but this one is the best!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie in Mobile, AL

customer_reviews.title: EASY LOW CARB COOKBOOK. NO SPECIAL INGREDIENTS NEEDED
customer_reviews.text: I wish that I would have bought this sooner. Every meal that Ive made from this book, so far, has been good. No special ingredients needed. All the recipes were easy, most were very quick to make and so yummy!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy M

customer_reviews.title: Best Low Carb Recipes EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I've prepared several recipes from this book and every one has been fantastic! I'm literally cooking food from one of chef Stella's recipe books every week, simply because the food is so amazing--after 45 years of cooking I've finally found a source for recipes that is consistently fantastic. I'm now making gourmet food, not just cooking. I will continue to buy Stella cookbooks as often as he authors them!
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Staeven

customer_reviews.title: Great Low CArb Cookbook
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this cookbook. I had a terrible time getting it away from him. Big print; easy to follow instructions; ingredients that most low carbers have at home; and the recipes taste great. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy I finally opened this book
customer_reviews.text: Sat for about 2 weeks until I decided to use it. The recipes are SO easy and usually everything I need is already in the house. So happy with this guy's recipes 🤗 (Parmesan crusted chicken with roasted asparagus & snicker doodles)
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great Book
customer_reviews.text: The Stella family is amazing. George has come up with so many wonderful recipes that you won't even know your on a diet until you check your weight. You are losing weight, eating until you're full and very satisfied. We enjoyed a lovely Thanksgiving and continued to lose weight. I thought I hated cauliflower... I just didn't know what to do with it. I love it mashed and it makes a wonderful mock potato salad. If you are new to low carb dieting, like me, this is a very good book to find recipes and inspiration. Down 30 lbs. in first 2 months, slower now but my weight is still going down about 2 lbs. a week.
customer_reviews.author: Doreen O

customer_reviews.title: Delicious recipes!
customer_reviews.text: This cookbook is awesome! Every recipe I make tastes delicious and is easy to follow. Recipe ingredients are normal ones that most low-carb eaters will already have in the kitchen. Delighted with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: LindyLouTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: This is the best recipe book I have ever bought
customer_reviews.text: This is the best recipe book I have ever bought. All my other pretty cookbooks serve as decorations in my kitchen. The ingredients are so simple, and can be found in any grocery store. Most of the recipes are easy and quick. But most importantly, they taste delicious.
customer_reviews.author: K. Erdenebaatar

customer_reviews.title: Stella has the best low carb, low sugar cookbooks
customer_reviews.text: I have only been on a low carb, low sugar diet for 4 months. I have 4 of George Stella’s books & they are all great. Most of the recipes are easy with easy to get ingredients This is one of my favorite I’ve made 7 recipes so far from this book & they were all good. The Cinnamon Bun Mug Muffin is great for breakfast, don’t forget the frosting!!
customer_reviews.author: Dallas E. Moon

customer_reviews.title: Love The Stella Style
customer_reviews.text: I've been cooking out of George Stella's cookbooks for a year now. Love doing the low carb/low sugar lifestyle and am down 25 pounds the past 7 months! George's recipes are easy and delish. I just purchased this cookbook as a birthday gift. All of George's cookbooks are great but this is my go-to. Chicken Marsala is on the menu tonight!
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Parker

customer_reviews.title: I love the forward and how detailed it is describing the ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the forward and how detailed it is describing the author's family's adventure in low-carb dieting. I am needing to change to a low carb diet, but my mom does most of the cooking for us, this cookbook helped her to understand what low carb cooking is and why it is so important. Great book!
customer_reviews.author: MaliSue

customer_reviews.title: If you're going to buy one low carb cookbook, get this one
customer_reviews.text: A really excellent cookbook, not just a diet cookbook either. A good mix of recipes, the right amount of complexity of ingredients (hard to get the balance there so kudos), well presented, and tasty. Also own two of Dana Carpender's books and the Atkins cookbook. The others are very disappointing in comparison.
customer_reviews.author: Josh K.

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy recipes, for the most part
customer_reviews.text: I have made about eight recipes in this book and been pleased with the results so far. The recipes have been fairly quick and easy with ingredients that I usually have on hand already. I was just looking for some new ideas and this cookbook provided them.
customer_reviews.author: J Davis

customer_reviews.title: Easy to follow instructions for recipes that people really eat
customer_reviews.text: Easy to follow instructions for recipes that people really eat. I especially like the staples list provided for ingredients that were used often. Would definitely recommend this book to anyone wanting to lower carb intake and still enjoy what they eat.
customer_reviews.author: Linda H. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: yummy recipes.
customer_reviews.text: Down to earth recipes along with beautiful pix and nutritional info. Love it!! Would buy again. Good recipes for diabetics too. Really a nice Book.
customer_reviews.author: granee

customer_reviews.title: This cookbook is amazing. The receipes I have tried are fantastic and ...
customer_reviews.text: This cookbook is amazing. The receipes I have tried are fantastic and easy to make plus the shopping list for each receipe is an add on bonus. Initally in this cookbook their is a list of things to have in your pantry. Finally their is a breakdown of the foods you are preparing. I would highly reccomend this cookbook.
customer_reviews.author: sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Need something fast and Easy, this is the book for you from Appetizers, Breakfast, Lunch, Dinner & Desserts
customer_reviews.text: If you are low carbing, then you should really invest in a good cookbook like this, by George Stella. The recipes are excellent and takes little to no time in preparing. Everything you need for the dish is included in a grocery shopping list that he displays near the photo of the recipe. George, has done it again.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: George Stella Just Gets It!
customer_reviews.text: Ignore the negative reviews and get this book. It is really helpful in providing recipes the whole family can enjoy - not just the person who is eating low-carb. I was able to meal prep a few of these and they came out great! I just trust George Stella when it comes to his recipes. Good, sensible meals that don't require ingredients that aren't available at my grocery store.
customer_reviews.author: Chelzie

customer_reviews.title: Great cook book but needs serving size info
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cook book! I've made a few recipes and they turned out just delicious. However, even though there's a net carb count and number of servings listed for each recipe, the author does not specify the serving size. So, for example, if it's a recipe for cookies, there's a net carb amount listed, but it does not specify how many cookies this is for. Overall, it's great, but it would be even better with the serving size information.
customer_reviews.author: Violet G.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Cookbook
customer_reviews.text: I love this cookbook. It has great recipes and not so fancy that you'd never make them. Highly recommend this cookbook as one of the BEST on the market!!!!
customer_reviews.author: jward

customer_reviews.title: Great low carb cookbook
customer_reviews.text: love this cookbook. 2nd one of George Stella's book I've order. Beautifully written, nice pictures, easy recipes to follow. Best low carb books I've found.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Schoon

customer_reviews.title: Life Saver
customer_reviews.text: George Stella makes low-carb choices simple. Love his easy recipes and easy to use ingredients. My blood sugars stablized after 6/8 weeks of using his tips. He's done the work himself and is an expert as far as I'm concerned. A1C has dropped from 9.7 to 6.4 and is still dropping. Soon I can add a few carbs to what I'm doing in order to maintain a steady number. Thank you, Chef Stella. Amazon filled my order and I received it in 2 days on Prime membership....shipping was *free*. Have already sent a copy as a gift to someone I love....
customer_reviews.author: Calleyrose

customer_reviews.title: Bland food ... not suitable for larger families
customer_reviews.text: Recipes are bland. Odd ingredients generally not something you have around the house. Most meat recipes are supposed to be cooked in a pan on the stove top, making it difficult to prepare a meal for an entire family at one time.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know that such good food was available eating low-carb. Most recipes DO have pictures, which was important for me. It will be quite easy to continue this lifestyle with the choices available here. And, reading the personal story, complete with before and after pictures of the chef's family is an incentive to learn to cook and eat low-carb.
customer_reviews.author: Dena

customer_reviews.title: and have yet to be disappointed in any of the recipes in this book
customer_reviews.text: I'm following the Atkins diet, and have yet to be disappointed in any of the recipes in this book. It surpasses excellent! Everything is spelled out simply and straight-forward, and the meals are delicious. My sister-in-law was treated to the "Cauliflower Mock Potato Salad" that I made a month ago, and has made it once a week since. Good stuff! Super book!
customer_reviews.author: Macahuna

customer_reviews.title: I've tried several recipes and they turned out ok. ...
customer_reviews.text: I've tried several recipes and they turned out ok. Had to order some ingredients online since my local grocery store did not carry (or were very expensive).
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth Corona

customer_reviews.title: Great Cookbook
customer_reviews.text: I just received this cookbook in addition to Low Carb Essentials: Everyday Low-Carb Recipes by George Stella and they both look great! The layout is really easy to read and follow and the recipes use normal, everyday ingredients. I haven't prepared any of the recipes yet but am planning to begin tonight. I was impressed with the quality of the book itself. Plus, I love the fact that these recipes were actually created by and are currently used by the author and his family. The author included personal pictures and information about his own life and how much weight he and his family have lost; that part is very inspirational to me.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Simple, tasty recipes
customer_reviews.text: Good recipes for a beginner. Would like to see calories included in the nutrients.
customer_reviews.author: Suzyzzle

customer_reviews.title: Great Book
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful book, especially for deserts which I am really really missing. Very happy I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Dobson

customer_reviews.title: A few more recipes
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy the recipes in this book along with the pictures. My only complaint is that I wish there were more recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Mary_e5

customer_reviews.title: This book is much better than his "family style" recipe book
customer_reviews.text: This book is much better than his "family style" recipe book. This one uses almond flour and the other "old" book uses all soy flour.
customer_reviews.author: P. Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Practical low carb cookbook!
customer_reviews.text: Great practical book. I have most George's books but this is by far my favorite. I do change some of his ingredients (I don't use vegetable oil or Splenda) but overall the book is easy and useful. Made the Chicken Marsala tonight and it was delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Sinai Princess

customer_reviews.title: I love the recipes
customer_reviews.text: OMG!!! I love the recipes. They are so easy to follow and sooo deeelicious! If you can only afford one lo-carb cookbook, this is it!
customer_reviews.author: P. Gluckin

customer_reviews.title: I love this recipe book
customer_reviews.text: I love this recipe book! It has some fantastic recipes in it! It is low carb, yes, but it is also just full of healthy and delicious recipes. Nothing is too hard to make either. Love it! My kids have loved many of the recipes too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good recipes!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my brother in law who recently suffered a massive heart attack. He and his wife have both enjoyed the recipes in their quest to change their eating habits.
customer_reviews.author: riverhome5

customer_reviews.title: I love this book so much that I am going to ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this book so much that I am going to get it spiral bound and pages laminated! Okay, I am a sloppy cook, I admit it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura P Foxall

customer_reviews.title: Best of the Best for sure!
customer_reviews.text: I have to agree, this is probably the best book from Mr Stella yet, Everything that we expect from him as well as new innovations and updates on sweeteners and other innovations to make cooking without sugars and extra ingredients we do not need easier in todays cooking world. Beautiful photos and recipes will keep your "post it notes" busy on lots of to do pages, I know my book is loaded with them! Easy to make recipes that taste awesome, I love all the cauliflower recipes!
customer_reviews.author: spice1217

customer_reviews.title: Maybe low carb but not necessarily healthy
customer_reviews.text: I was a little alarmed that he used vegetable oil to fry in. Neither of which is healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara H.

customer_reviews.title: L❤️VE this cookbook, it’s educational and the recipes are really good
customer_reviews.text: Family loves the food, what more is there to say. The author is transparent and inspiring. If you are faced with life style changes this cook book is for you. Don’t despair, this cook book brought me hope for a better me. And I’m losing weight eating yummy food. You can too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A cookbook for the carb junkie
customer_reviews.text: I have a love affair with carbs and because of that (and turning 40!) carbs no longer love me!!! This cookbook is wonderful! Great, simple recipes with "normal" ingredients and not overly difficult. I am not a wonderful cook at all, and my family actually LOVED everything I've made from this cookbook. Simple, easy and economical AND a nice gift to the waistline!! I don't even miss my carbs anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: I liked the cookbook
customer_reviews.text: Yes, I liked the cookbook. I found some interesting recipes to try. I love the Sausage, Eggs and Cheese in a muffin tin. Very easy to make. I'm sorry i forgot what they are called, but look under breakfast. Easy to microwave for the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Rigert

customer_reviews.title: Simple and delicious recipes!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing cookbook. The recipes are simple, and the food is delicious. Additionally, the ingredients are actually things that are common and easily found at the local grocery store. All the calorie, protein, and carb counts are listed. Excellent choice for anyone embracing a low-carb lifestyle.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Green

customer_reviews.title: So many recipes with colorful pictures
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a Christmas gift and she loved the multiple low carb recipes and pictures
customer_reviews.author: Kathy P

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This guy proves you can still eat great stuff on low carb.
customer_reviews.author: Charles J Thoma

customer_reviews.title: George Stella's Best Cookbook Yet!
customer_reviews.text: We have not prepared very many recipes yet, but the ones we have made are delicious. I would have liked to see recipes using coconut flour in addition to the almond and flax meal flour he relies on. But what I have tried so far is delicious - and the photos of the other food looks wonderful as well. My husband and I both recognize we feel better when we avoid all grains - so this is a helpful book.
customer_reviews.author: Grateful Grammy

customer_reviews.title: Great book with easy-to-follow recipes
customer_reviews.text: Great book with easy-to-follow recipes. The recipes are so tasty, it's hard to believe they are low-carb. It's become my go-to book for fast, yummy meals.
customer_reviews.author: SMNumbers

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Book
customer_reviews.text: I saw this book while visiting a friend, she highly recommended it so I ordered one, my sister-in-law saw mine and ordered herself one! :-) We're all very happy with it. We made seven of the recipes so far and each was a winner!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn K. Stimer

customer_reviews.title: works
customer_reviews.text: I cook from this all the time and I ordered 3 more of his books. I have lost over 3 inches in 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah Ringelstetter

customer_reviews.title: Recipes looked delicious. I haven't cooked from the book ...
customer_reviews.text: Recipes looked delicious. I haven't cooked from the book yet, but have many recipes marked. And, by his and his family's weight loss, you can see it works. Plan to start using the book next week.
customer_reviews.author: H. Howard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: George has some of the best low carb recipes. I have made several and all were a hit.
customer_reviews.author: S. Tilton

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth purchasing!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing recipes! I finally started cooking out of this book this past weekend. I have now made four different recipes, all of which I absolutely loved and so did everyone else that tried them! Thank you so much for putting this book out there. I just ordered another G. Stella book to try even more great recipes. Eating this type of lifestyle requires quite a selection of food or it gets very boring. I am thrilled to have all of these options now, thank you again!!
customer_reviews.author: Leah P/T H

customer_reviews.title: Low Carb cookbook
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for the low carb eater in your life.
customer_reviews.author: Coach Bill

customer_reviews.title: Better then old school Atkins
customer_reviews.text: Great recipes I did the Atkins diet years ago lost over 80 pounds I want to get back on track again so I bought this book and this seems wonderful
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best low-carb cookbook around
customer_reviews.text: The best low-carb cookbook around. Simple to use, great recipes, has become my go to "cooking bible" am looking forward to getting the other books he has written. You can download them on George Stella website for $7.00, but is not like having the "book" in hand
customer_reviews.author: minpinmom

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful for me as a novice
customer_reviews.text: Like book, like recipes, enjoyable to read. Easier to walk after somebody who was there and done that.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria of YHVH

customer_reviews.title: Glad I found this cookbook!
customer_reviews.text: Being a Type 2 Diabetic trying to lower my A1-C, I was very glad to have found this resource. With it's easy, tasty recipes, it's now my go-to cookbook.
customer_reviews.author: ELAINE C.

customer_reviews.title: This is packed full of easy to make low carb recipes
customer_reviews.text: This is packed full of easy to make low carb recipes. Photos also show what the finished dish looks like. I really enjoy this cookbook.
customer_reviews.author: mary wagner

customer_reviews.title: Great recipes for the whole family
customer_reviews.text: Love this book. The photos are wonderful. I've lived low carb for years so I don't need another "how to" book...just more recipes. Glad I bought this. I also bought a copy for my parents. My Mom loves it and sends me pics of the food she makes from the book.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Becker

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: If you want good ideas for cooking low carb this is a good book to start with
customer_reviews.author: colleen wilson

customer_reviews.title: Delicious healthy food
customer_reviews.text: Lowered my A1C by two points just by eating low carb
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Filling recipes
customer_reviews.text: Wish there was an index by food ingredients! Otherwise, bon appetite!
customer_reviews.author: E. Cates

product_meta.title: The Complete Low-Carb Cookbook (Best of the Best Presents)
